name: Guelph Medical Imaging - Guelph - Cardigan St
comment:
Diagnostic imaging clinic

Services include:
  • ultrasound
  • vascular x-ray
  • bone mineral density testing
  • mammography (breast x-rays used to screen and diagnose medical conditions)

Ontario Breast Screening Program - Breast screening for early detection of breast cancer in women * screening includes mammography (x-rays of breast tissue) * screening results are sent to both the woman and her doctor * women who receive normal results are automatically recalled for their next screening appointment * women who receive abnormal results are referred to their doctor for further investigation, or are referred directly for additional tests

description_of_this:
Diagnostic imaging clinic

Services include:
  • ultrasound
  • vascular x-ray
  • bone mineral density testing
  • mammography (breast x-rays used to screen and diagnose medical conditions)

Ontario Breast Screening Program - Breast screening for early detection of breast cancer in women * screening includes mammography (x-rays of breast tissue) * screening results are sent to both the woman and her doctor * women who receive normal results are automatically recalled for their next screening appointment * women who receive abnormal results are referred to their doctor for further investigation, or are referred directly for additional tests, Codes: Most services covered by OHIP, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Referral: Medical referral required
Ontario Breast Screening Program: Call for appointment * no referral required for women between 50 and 74 years * medical referrals also accepted for women between 30 and 69 years, Address: 54 Cardigan St, Guelph, ON, N1H 3Z6, Location: lat: 43.5498, lon: -80.254, Contact: phone: 226-314-0778
